title: shiridEnum
sahitya:
shiridEnum irangalAgAdA dEvA


anupallavi

  arivilA shiriyEn en appA appAvenru aDi iNai paNindu ninraraTruvadu kETTum


caraNam    kAmAdi arupaghai kurangugaLin kaiyilE pUmAlai pOlum enai
 koDuttadu mun karuNaiyO sOmashEkhara kapAlIshvara krpAkara
 shrI mayilApuri vAsA kalpakAmbikai nEshA
